meanings.definition: To tinker or fiddle with something in a casual or aimless manner.
meanings.sent1: She was futzing with her phone, trying to fix the settings.
meanings.sent2: Stop futzing with the TV remote and just choose a channel.
meanings.sent3: While futzing with the puzzle, she accidentally mixed up the pieces.
meanings.sent4: He futzed with the old car engine until it finally started running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The child was futzing with the toy, exploring all its buttons and features.

meanings.definition: To waste time or procrastinate by making minor adjustments or changes.
meanings.sent1: Instead of studying, he spent hours futzing with his desk arrangement.
meanings.sent2: She kept futzing around with her outfit instead of getting ready on time.
meanings.sent3: He was futzing with his excuses, trying to delay the inevitable deadline.
meanings.sent4: Stop futzing with the presentation slides and just practice your speech.
meanings.sent5: The team was futzing with the project details instead of moving forward with the plan.

meanings.definition: To handle or deal with something in a clumsy or inept manner.
meanings.sent1: He was futzing with the fragile vase, almost dropping it multiple times.
meanings.sent2: She futzed with the computer cables, causing more confusion than before.
meanings.sent3: The chef was futzing with the new recipe, creating a mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Stop futzing with the delicate equipment; you might break it!
meanings.sent5: The toddler was futzing with the buttons, not realizing the consequences of pressing them.
